knimeNode.name: XML To JSON
knimeNode.shortDescription: Converts XML values to JSON values.

fullDescription.intro: Converts XML values to JSON values. Attributes are translated with prefix @, processing instructions with ? prefix to their name as a key in a JSON object. When there are multiple texts surrounding inner elements, those are translated as JSON array elements instead of an object with the specified key. Example:some text gets translated to:{"a": {"@b": "2", "v": {"#text": "some text"} } }
fullDescription.option: Replace input column, keep its name

option.name: Text body translated to JSON with key

fullDescription.option: This key will be used for XML text content to be represented in JSON

ports.outPort: Table containing the converted JSON column.
